test.name: Default_001

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.msg: Element 'Xpath=//input[@id="id_default_username"]' did not appear in 5 seconds

test.doc: 1、检查默认配置页面元素，应该含有“用户名”、“密码”、确认密码三个输入框和一个名称为“保存”的按钮； 2、Default Configuration页面，不输入信息，点击“保存”按钮；
test.status: Element 'Xpath=//input[@id="id_default_username"]' did not appear in 5 seconds
